thread.title: Windsor Resources is Proud to Announce Two Years in a Row on the Inc. 5000 List
thread.title_full: Windsor Resources is Proud to Announce Two Years in a Row on the Inc. 5000 List

author: Kiah Jones
title: Windsor Resources is Proud to Announce Two Years in a Row on the Inc. 5000 List
text:
The 34th annual Inc. 5000 list sponsored by Inc. Magazine has honored Windsor Resources, LLC for a second consecutive year with inclusion on their exclusive list of the nation’s fastest growing private companies. Windsor Resources, LLC is a prominent Talent Acquisition firm in New York, NY that drives results for business by partnering with corporations on staffing for Office Support, IT, Accounting/Finance, Healthcare/Medical and Temporary Support. This announcement follows several strategic initiatives led by CEO John M. Schapiro to strengthen core business at Windsor Resources, LLC including the launch of the Public Accounting and Consulting Services Division and Windsor Employer Services a PEO (Professional Employer Organization).
“We are honored to be recognized once again for our efforts. This success is attributed to remaining steadfast in our commitment to being in the relationship business with the function of staffing. Furthermore, being on Inc. 5000’s 2015 List shows we are doing something right; we owe that to ourselves as professionals and to our customers who deserve nothing less.” said Schapiro
Windsor Resources, LLC continues to achieve impressive acceleration in revenue growth with an increase of 72% over the past 3 years. According to the list, Windsor Resources, LLC is the only company of its size to experience revenue growth at this rate. The closest company by employee population has grown at a rate of 47%. This is quite an accomplishment for the small firm of less than 30 employees.
Founded in 2009, Windsor Resources, LLC not only survived the recession but is a clear leader in the Talent Acquisition industry both locally and nationally. According to Schapiro, “There isn’t one answer or secret to our success. However, a diversified client base developed by internal partners who are loyal ‘A’ players can make all of the difference. By fostering an environment of authenticity, transparency and teamwork, we have continued to thrive.”
About Windsor Resources, LLC
Windsor Resources, LLC is the parent company for the Windsor Resources Group of Companies, a full-service staffing brand that aims to provide the best talent to valued clients in a timely manner through strategic sourcing, assessment and delivery. CEO John M. Schapiro is a member of the Cambridge Who’s Who for 2011-2012. He is a Board Member of St. Paul’s Nursing School and is a featured speaker at many colleges and trade organizations throughout the New York City area. He holds a Masters from New York University and is available for interviews, and can be reached at john(at)windsorresources(dot)com
